title: Understanding
description:
Nimisha Ladva, Paul Gilmartin, and Jillian Szafranski share stories about a Mother in Law, a crisis at a 12-step meeting, and a postcard from another era.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Kevin Yost, Ernie K-Doe, Paul Gilmartin, Liz Vice, Jillian Szafranski, Sarah Humphreys, Kevin Allison, Nimisha Ladva)
